attributes.action: charge any mp claiming false expenses with fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every person in this country should be under the same law. If anyone else in this country claimed false expenses, they would be charged with fraud. This same law should apply to MP's

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
